items.title: Alışveriş Asistanı
items.summary: Online alışveriş sitelerinde incelediğiniz ürünüm en ucuz fiyatlı alternatifini bulmanıza yardımcı olan bir eklenti
fulltext: Bu bir Google Chrome™ eklentisidir. Alışveriş ve fiyat araştırmalarınızda size zaman ve paradan tasarruf etmenizi sağlayacak, doğru kararları daha hızlı şekilde almanıza yardımcı olacak.
* Aktif sayfadaki ürünün ismini, resmini, fiyatını ve diğer detaylarını otomatik algılama
* Diğer alışveriş sitelerinde ürünle ilgili arama yapıp size sunma
* Diğer alternatiflere tık tıklama ile ulaşabilme
* Diğer alternatiflerin isimini, resmini, fiyatını, fiyat farkını (+/-) görebilme
• n11.com
• gittigidiyor.com
• hepsiburada.com
• trendyol.com
• amazon.com.tr
Not: Şuan sadece Türkiye'deki bazı alışveriş siteleri desteklenmektedir. O nedenle de dil olarak sadece Türkçe desteklenmektedir.
• Gizlilik Sözleşmesi

items.title: Avicenna Telemedicine Platform
items.summary: Project is a international project with multiple partners from various countries (Turkey, USA, Switzerland, Israel,Macedonia). This ERP Project consists of multiple sub-systems: Avicenna ATTP, Telemedicine System (Jasmine), Microsoft Dynamic NAV with CRM module and 3rd Party Call-Center solutions. ATTP is the one of the core system of the whole architecture that we have developed.
items.fulltext: ATTP was the major system that has the integrations with other sub-systems and some extra external services like Cargo, SMS, VPOS etc.
modules: Integrations (telemedicine system, microsoft NAV, VPOS, cargo etc.)

items.title: Avicenna FDS
items.summary: Avicenna FDS is one of the major core modules of Avicenna HIS. Avicena FDS provides a free style form design surface for end users to create and edit new forms integrated to most of the HIS modules such as medical forms, medical reports, order forms, quality data collection forms etc. Forms can be authorized to target user groups and target departments. Avicena FDS provides most of the functionalities of modern IDE platforms in the market. Both backend and frontend layers of the module were developed using Java.

items.title: Avicenna Case-Mix Information System
items.summary: It is a complete DRG Costing Solution. I designed and implemented the architecture, managed the project, developed reusable advanced components, coordinated and lead the team. Project was also used in about 80 hospitals from all over the Turkey, even biggest ones. We collected and anayzed more than 50 billion clinical and financial records (about 5TB). Eventually, we have calculated the first official DRG costs and weighted DRG values of Turkey.

items.title: TİG Veri Aktarım Programı (DRG Data Transfer Program)
items.summary: TIGVAP is a specialized data transfer software developed to facilitate the export of DRG (Diagnosis Related Groups/Teşhisle İlişkili Gruplar) data from Hospital Information Management Systems (HIMS) to the Turkish Ministry of Health's DRG data collection software. The program enables hospitals to easily transfer required DRG data without additional HIMS modifications, supporting Turkey's healthcare reform initiatives for resource management and cost control.
fulltext: TIGVAP (TİG Veri Aktarım Programı) was developed by DataSel as a social responsibility project to support Turkish healthcare institutions.

The software addresses the challenge of DRG (Diagnosis Related Groups) data collection required by the Turkish Ministry of Health as part of healthcare reforms for resource management and cost control.
• Easy data extraction from existing Hospital Information Management Systems
• No additional development required for HIMS software
• User-friendly interface for data completion and validation
• Direct integration with Ministry of Health DRG collection system
• Provided as free software under social responsibility initiative
The program significantly reduces the complexity of DRG data reporting for Turkish hospitals and supports the national healthcare digitization efforts.
modules: Ministry of Health Data Format Converter
User Interface for Data Review and Completion

items.title: Avicenna MBYS - Clinic Management System
items.summary: Avicenna MBYS (Muayenehane Bilgi Yönetim Sistemi) is a 100% web-based clinic application designed to meet all the needs of doctors with private clinics while ensuring secure data transmission to the Turkish Ministry of Health's Sağlık.Net application as required by government regulations.
fulltext: Avicenna MBYS (Clinic Management System) is a comprehensive web-based healthcare solution specifically designed for private medical clinics and individual practitioners.
The system provides complete clinic management capabilities while ensuring compliance with Turkish Ministry of Health regulations and data reporting requirements.
• Full integration with Ministry of Health Sağlık.Net application
• Secure patient data management and privacy protection
• User-friendly interfaces optimized for medical staff workflows
• Multi-browser compatibility (Internet Explorer, Opera, Firefox, Safari, Chrome)

Built with Microsoft Silverlight 5.0 technology featuring advanced animations and visual components, the application supports multi-layered architecture and works seamlessly across different platforms and browsers.
The system enables private clinic doctors to focus on patient care while automating administrative tasks and ensuring regulatory compliance with government health reporting requirements.

items.title: Avicenna Transcription System
items.summary: Advanced medical transcription and documentation system designed for healthcare organizations and clinical documentation needs.
fulltext: Avicenna Transcription System (ATS) is a specialized platform for managing medical transcription, clinical documentation, and healthcare record conversion processes.
The system provides comprehensive tools for medical documentation, voice-to-text conversion, and clinical record management.

items.title: Avicenna Telemedicine Health Platform
items.summary: Advanced telemedicine platform enabling remote healthcare delivery and patient monitoring capabilities.
fulltext: Avicenna Telemedicine Health Platform (ATHP) provides comprehensive remote healthcare services and patient monitoring solutions.
The platform enables healthcare providers to deliver medical services remotely while maintaining high standards of care and patient safety.

items.title: Integrated Hospital Business System
items.summary: Comprehensive hospital business management system integrating clinical, financial, and administrative operations.
fulltext: Integrated Hospital Business System (IHBS) provides complete business management solutions for healthcare organizations.
The system integrates clinical operations with financial management and administrative processes to optimize hospital efficiency.

items.title: Sağlık Takipçim - Personal Health Tracker
items.summary: Personal health monitoring and tracking application for individuals to manage their wellness journey.
fulltext: Sağlık Takipçim (My Health Tracker) is a personal health management application designed to help individuals monitor and track their health and wellness activities.
The application provides comprehensive tools for personal health management and lifestyle optimization.

items.title: Frizbi - Interactive Educational Game
items.summary: Interactive educational game designed to teach physics concepts through engaging frisbee simulation gameplay.
fulltext: Frizbi is an interactive educational game that teaches physics concepts through engaging frisbee simulation and gameplay mechanics.
The game combines entertainment with education to help students understand physics principles in an interactive environment.
